text: Ian gumazir dapaniba 40plan aruebar nguazir aghuim getigha, moga an gani. Eghtɨ ia uan arazir kuraba bangɨn, ivezir kuram inivɨra ikɨ mangɨtɨ, 40plan azeniba gɨvagham. Kɨ 40plan aruer kabagh nɨghnɨgha da mengegha 40plan azenibar ivezir kuram ia danɨngam. Eghtɨ ia kamaghɨn ganigh na gɨfogham, arazir ia amir kaba, kɨ bar dagh ifongezir puvatɨ.
